title: Tasty Barbeque Pulled Chicken Sandwich Recipe
content:
A super juicy and delicious sandwich made using leftover chicken. You can use up leftover grilled chicken or rotisserie chicken. This makes a great lunch box option as well.

Last week we had a party at home, we ordered a few grilled chicken from a nearby takeout place. I got a few leftover grilled chickens from that. I shredded the chicken the next day and made two different types of sandwiches to show you. One is this yummy barbeque chicken sliders the next one is chicken salad sandwiches.

 

Barbeque Pulled Chicken Sandwich Recipe - Leftover Chicken Recipe Ideas

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 10 mins

Total time: 20 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Leftover Chicken - 2 cups shredded

Oil - 1 teaspoon

Garlic - 3 cloves chopped finely

Onion - 1 sliced

Barbeque Sauce - ½ cup

Burger Buns as needed

Cheese Slice as needed

 

FOR SALAD:

Onion - ½ sliced thinly

Cabbage - 2 cups sliced thinly

Carrot - 1 sliced thinly

Green Chillies - 1 chopped finely

Coriander Leaves - 3 tablespoons chopped finely

Sugar- 1 teaspoon

Salt to taste

Vinegar - 1 to 2 tablespoon

 

Instructions

Preheat oven to 200 degrees C.

Mix all the ingredients for a salad and set aside.

Heat oil in a pan, add garlic and onion and saute for a min.

Add in barbeque sauce and mix well. Bring it to a boil.

Add in chicken and mix well.

Take burger bun and slit it open.

Top with the chicken filling, top with cheese slice.

Cover it up with another half.

Wrap in foil and pop it in the oven.

Bake for 5 to 8 mins.

Remove and serve it with salad.

recommendations.title: Tasty Ghee Chicken Curry Recipe
recommendations.content:
The spicy and flavourful chicken curry which is made using some spicy toasted spice powders. The ghee adds a nice flavor to the chicken curry. So good.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
